title: Masked shaco or Nutcracko?
body:
Title says it all! I can't decide if I want Masked shaco or Nutcracko. I'm looking for the one worth more than the other.  Please help me! 

Thanks! 

Comment below!

replies.body: nutcrack. its not shaco without the worm dance. masked shaco dance isn't any good

I've played so much with the nutcrako skin its became my personal favourite but then again if you are looking for a good visual and ability changes then masked shaco is the only one to look completely different but i don't really like it. Plus its a Christmas legacy 1 year before you can get it again so you look even better xD

I liked masked better because of the visual
Of course,it all depends on your opinion,so check out Skin Spotlights if you are pondering over both of them!

Masked is the best shaco skin to play with because it changes the color of his smoke. Instead of that stupid bright orange shit you can actually surprise some people if they aren't paying attention. Pretty sure they are worth about the same but you can just check the shop...
